channel.title: InfusePS - Your Next Favorite Private Server! - BETA TESTERS NEEDED!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XLli1sH.png[/img]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AkXUyesfAt0
[HR]
[B][U][SIZE=3]This server is in open beta. Once we see that the server is stable enough, and our beta participants are happy enough, we will release the server with our own funds paying for advertisements. [/SIZE][/U][/B]
[FONT=Arial][B][SIZE=3]Our Vision: We want to completely cater to the whims of our community. This is a completely community driven project so we plan to change and adapt the server to the needs of our players so that when we release, we KNOW our server will be perfect.[/SIZE][/B][/FONT][/CENTER]
[SIZE=3]We are an open beta, and as such anyone joining will be consider a "Beta Tester". Don't worry, we don't plan on resetting our economy or levels when we release. We need as much feedback as possible so don't be afraid to report a bug, it's all apart of the beta experience. [U]We will also reward beta testers upon our release with exclusive rares, a title, and anything else we can thing of between now and when we decide to release (tbd.) as a thank you for sticking with us through these wild times :).[/U][/SIZE]
[HR]
[size=3][b]Links:[/b][/size]
[ul][*][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jchuHax.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://infuse-ps.com/"]Home[/URL] [*][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aOVfknV.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://infuse-ps.com/forums/index.php"]Forums[/URL] [*][IMG]https://cdn4.iconfinder.com/data/icons/SUPERVISTA/business/png/16/trophy.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://infuse-ps.com/hiscores"]Hiscores[/URL] [*][IMG]https://cdn0.iconfinder.com/data/icons/kameleon-free-pack-rounded/110/Download-Computer-16.png[/img][URL=http://"http://infuse-ps.com/files/Infuse.jar"] Download Client[/URL] [*][IMG]https://cdn4.iconfinder.com/data/icons/cologne/16x16/finished-work.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://infuse-ps.com/vote"]Vote[/URL][/ul]
[size=3][b]Development Team:[/b][/size]
[ul][*][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jfr8cOR.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/matt+j/"]Matt J[/URL] - Ingame/Forums Dev[*][URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/Munien/"]Munien[/URL] - Ingame Developer[*][URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/Bullnox/"]Sam[/URL] - Community Manager[/ul]
[size=3][b]Note:[/b][/size] [SIZE=1]InfusePS is a private server I have worked on myself and it is based off of the recent Ruse release. Before people begin to criticize my choice of base and call me a leecher, I'd just like you to hear me out. I think Ruse is a good base for someone with my level of experience (about a year of coding) to work on and I want to make it something that the players want. I have already put a lot of time into changing it around, and as time goes on, I will cater to the needs of our community and it will distance itself more and more from plain old ruse. If you decide not to participate still, that's okay.. I can't make you, but I will dedicate all my time to this server and I hope everyone who does join has an awesome experience and stays until the end.[/SIZE]
We're currently looking for a gfx artists and some more client/server developers :).
[HR]
[table][tr][td][img]https://cdn4.iconfinder.com/data/icons/berlin/16x16/featured.png[/img][size=3][b]Some Server Stuff:[/b][/size] [ul][*]Bank Tabs w/Searching [*]16 Challenging Bosses [*]Over 100 Achievements [*]Dungeoneering [*]Multiple Quests [*]Duo Slayer [*]Fully working dwarf multicannon [*]Daily Updates [*]Completionist, Max and Veteran cape all implemented [*]Unique Memberzone [*]Well of Goodwill [*]Website Hiscores [*]Autovote and Store [*]Clean & Professional Forums [*]Mature Staff Team [*]Player-focused developer[/ul] [/td][/tr][/table]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZUmmXVN.png[/img]
[HR]
[IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w470/matt_jones13/1_zpsnu6v5edh.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w470/matt_jones13/2_zpsc2hfewe5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w470/matt_jones13/6_zpsj7vue3r4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w470/matt_jones13/5_zpsvcr5uuri.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w470/matt_jones13/4_zpscpblx1dr.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w470/matt_jones13/3_zpsfdncheos.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w470/matt_jones13/7_zpsutdka67m.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1077.photobucket.com/albums/w470/matt_jones13/8_zpsoxcjyq1q.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: InfusePS - Your Next Favorite Private Server! - BETA TESTERS NEEDED!
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

I think people would possibly overlook the whole “ruse source leecher” if you actually provided some media/features that you have done yourself. Everything you have listed on this thread is Ruse, and nothing else (apart from maybe your donor zone)

Read full topic
item.source: InfusePS - Your Next Favorite Private Server! - BETA TESTERS NEEDED!

item.title: InfusePS - Your Next Favorite Private Server! - BETA TESTERS NEEDED!
item.dc:creator: @Infuse Infuse
item.description:
@Infuse wrote:

[CENTER]

[HR]

[SIZE=3]This server is in open beta. Once we see that the server is stable enough, and our beta participants are happy enough, we will release the server with our own funds paying for advertisements. [/SIZE]

[FONT=Arial][SIZE=3]Our Vision: We want to completely cater to the whims of our community. This is a completely community driven project so we plan to change and adapt the server to the needs of our players so that when we release, we KNOW our server will be perfect.[/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER]

[SIZE=3]We are an open beta, and as such anyone joining will be consider a “Beta Tester”. Don’t worry, we don’t plan on resetting our economy or levels when we release. We need as much feedback as possible so don’t be afraid to report a bug, it’s all apart of the beta experience. We will also reward beta testers upon our release with exclusive rares, a title, and anything else we can thing of between now and when we decide to release (tbd.) as a thank you for sticking with us through these wild times :).[/SIZE]

[size=3]Note:[/size]
[SIZE=1]InfusePS is a private server I have worked on myself and it is based off of the recent Ruse release. Before people begin to criticize my choice of base and call me a leecher, I’d just like you to hear me out. I think Ruse is a good base for someone with my level of experience (about a year of coding) to work on and I want to make it something that the players want. I have already put a lot of time into changing it around, and as time goes on, I will cater to the needs of our community and it will distance itself more and more from plain old ruse. If you decide not to participate still, that’s okay… I can’t make you, but I will dedicate all my time to this server and I hope everyone who does join has an awesome experience and stays until the end.[/SIZE]

We’re currently looking for a gfx artists and some more client/server developers :).
